activities:
Commerce Technologies, Inc. (“CommerceHub”) may receive personal data from the EU and Switzerland as a data processor, through our business dealings with companies acting as data controllers in the EU and Switzerland.  The personal data that CommerceHub may receive enables the company to provide e-commerce drop-ship fulfillment services to our clients (retailers and suppliers), along with related services including, but not limited to, order tracking, order routing and reporting.
CommerceHub receives and transmits this information from and to our clients as they require to assist our clients with fulfilling on-line retail orders they receive.  Credit card, bank account information, government issued identification numbers, and other personal financial information is specifically excluded.
personaldata: The personal data may include an individual purchaser’s name, address, phone number, email address, products ordered, shipping methods (including carrier and tracking number) and similar information that our clients’ end-user customers provide when ordering products online from our clients.
